name: Bomber Brigade (nxdeveloper32)
description:
Bomber Brigade is a platform action game where Jack, tries to save human lives

Bomber Brigade. It is a 3D action and a strategy-based platform game that involves the player tackling enemies while trying to save the platform from getting destroyed by bombs. The platform is divided into tiles. The bombs drop on the tiles and wait for a few seconds before exploding and taking away the tile. 

The player must push away the bomb from the platform before it explodes all this while trying to strategically destroy or avoid other kinds of enemies that harm the player. 

This is a survival game where the player must try to save multiple planets and the lives on the planet. The Aliens are the destroyers and the population of the planet is the victim, while the player is a hero whose mission is to protect the planets. 

There is an analogy between the player and the number of tiles on the platform. At the end of each level, the number of lives saved by the player is awarded in the form of points. Also, the game awards the player during the level, by providing pickups that help him destroy his enemies easily. 

The more the number of platforms that the player has kept safe, the more will be the number of pickups he gets.

=================================================

Survival : Try to survive and save as many tiles as you can, on each level.

Human Lives : Each tile you save is one more Life you saved. 

Bombs : These are your primary enemies. Get rid of the bombs as soon as they drop on the platform. Bombs are the only enemies that are capable of destroying your platform.

Pickups : Make use of these special superpowers gifted to you by the humans. They are trying to help you on your journey in the best way they can.

Punch and Jump : These are your most important moves against the enemies. Time these well and you'll master the game.
